Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit
Texts.GettingStartedDescription: Learn how to create and run a new web application using the application startup template.
Texts.WebAppTutorialDescription: Learn how to build an ABP based web application named Acme.BookStore.
Texts.FluentUIThemeDescription: This demo uses Microsoft FluentUI Blazor as the UI component library instead of LeptonX Lite / Blazorise, proving that ABP's modular architecture works with any Blazor component library.
